ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:59:49 [Issue ID 4000-166361] urn:comicvine:4000-166361 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:28:25. [Issue ID 230709]
ComicInfo.Summary: Hell has arrived at the City of the Dead. After stealing the Necroplasm, the evil Killian has traveled across the land to bring the prize to his dying master, Bishop Gaston Gui. The madness is set to begin. Meanwhile, Gareth and the warrior girl Raven join forces in search of the Hellspawn Covenant. When they find him, they are in for the shock of their lives. Much has changed since Covenant's powers were stolen. What unravels when they discover the truth will change the lives of all involved. Covenant is not what he was and God help anyone stepping into his path.
ComicInfo.Title: Plague of Man
